title: Disconnecting during ranked champ select
body: I've been randomly getting disconnected during ranked champ select. It will happen on someone else's pick. The timer will run down to zero but then never go to the next pick. It will sit at zero for about 30-60 seconds then it will say everyone has left the room. Following that I'm returned to "assemble your party" with a nice punishment for "abandoning a game during champ select" the most recent disconnect I was not given a notice that I was disconnected just returned to "assemble your team" I have lost a significant amount of LP from this and now have a half hour punishment queue. Is this another one of those things I just need to wait 2 weeks for riot to fix or has anyone had any success finding a way around this issue?

replies.body:
When the timer in champion select runs down to 0 and is unresponsive, it's typically caused by a disconnection from the server. The server stops receiving a response from you, but it continues going on with the champ select. Because your client is disconnected from the server, it doesn't show what's going on next. There are a number of local or ISP network configurations that could cause this to happen, but our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions. 

Let me know if you still see issues after running through those steps.
